p22: MEMBERS OF THE INSTITUTION AND DELEGATES
bud-data exprev: This appropriation is intended to cover allowances and payments made to Members of the European Economic and Social Committee
relation: including special duty allowances and other allowances
amount year: and specific measures for disabled Members.
